nodes.text: The Shank was a region of the continent of Alanciar on the planet Kesh. The Alanciari, Keshiri natives of the area, said that their continent resembled the leg of a local creature known as a muntok; the Shank corresponded to the beast's lower leg. The region was to the continent's west, between the plateaus to the east and the Six Claws to the west.
